name: Bipole R-XX: Neville Battle Simple
description:
Originally receiving a private release in early 2020, Bipole R-XX: Neville Battle Simple is now finally released to the public!

Bipole R-XX: Neville Battle Simple is a multiplayer RPG featuring characters from the Neville Prophecy series and the Bipole series.

Bipole R-XX: Neville Battle Simple is playable by importing it into Google Drive. The game is mostly automated and the character bios are still currently canon in the Lemniscate lore.

  • Credits:
    • Jackachu: Head programmer, character programmer, artist
    • infinityJKA: Character programmer, artist
    • MrZed: Artist
